section.title: Overview
section.p: The Smart Waste Company is a service provider, which includes a single group that contains 10 configured devices and may support up to thousands of devices. The service provider or the company is the group owner that is billed for connectivity charges that includes recurring monthly charges, such as excess transaction charges and applicable taxes.

Each device has a monthly fee of 1 United States dollar that includes 10 Mobile Originated (MO) transactions. After a device exceeds 10 MO transactions in a month, the service provider applies a connectivity charge of 0.1 United States dollar per MO transaction. There are no other Mobile Terminated (MT) transactions applied to the device.

ul.li: The Smart Waste Company service provider has a single group containing 10 configured devices.
Each device is allotted a monthly fee of 1 United States dollars that covers 10 free SMS per month.
After a device exceeds the consumption of 10 free SMS allowed in a month, the service provider applies a connectivity charge of 0.1 United States dollar per SMS to the device.

note.p: Ensure that after creating a record, you distribute it to ME. Otherwise, the provisioning will not be successful.

Create a cap to restrict the usage for each device for free SMS to 10 only.
Create a rate, named as SmartWaste_SMS_Rate for tracking the SMS volume.
Create a lifecycle for accounts, devices, groups, and bundles.
Create a bundle, named as SmartWaste_DevicePlan.
Create an account and associate it with the account lifecycle.
Create group, for example, SmartWasteCompany_SMS in the current use case and associate it with the group lifecycle.
Create the devices and associate them with device lifecycle.
